name: StoryTraders
description:
This game is a simple digital adaptation of a card game in Portuguese, there might be typos or weird vocabulary due to bad translation to english.

This digital is made to be played by a ground of a minimum of 3 people each having the game downloaded on their phones.

Note that these rules are just suggestions. During the play tests we noticed that different grounds tend to come up with different rules that make the game more enjoyable for them.

How to play:

  1. Each round one player is chosen to come up with an ending. Example.: "and that's how I got bald". 
  2. After deciding the ending, each player randomize their character and weapon.
  3. Each player needs to come up with a story containing the random character and weapon that they got. The story also needs to end using the previously defined ending. We recommend setting a time limit of around 2 minutes for everyone to think of a story.
  4. When everyone has thought of a story or after  the time limit ends, everyone take turns sharing their stories to the entire group.
  5. After all the stories are shared, all the players vote for the best story.
  6. The player whose story was voted the best gets 1 point.
  7. The player who reaches 5 points first wins.
